ctx: intros A R l H xs bs cs H0.
exceptions.tactic: apply subRelGRBar with (f := (fun x : A => x)).
exceptions.exn: In environment A : Set R : Rel A l : list A H : GRBar A R l xs, bs, cs : list A H0 : l = xs ++ cs Unable to unify "Bar A (GoodR A ?M1489) (map (fun x : A => x) ?M1493)" with "Bar A (GoodR A R) (xs ++ bs ++ cs)".

ctx: intros A R l H xs bs cs H0.
exceptions.exn: In environment X : forall (A B : Set) (R : Rel A) (S : Rel B) (f : A -> B), (forall a b : A, R a b -> S (f a) (f b)) -> (forall b : B, {a : A | b = f a}) -> forall l : list A, GRBar A R l -> GRBar B S (map f l) A : Set R : Rel A xs, cs : list A H : GRBar A R (xs ++ cs) bs : list A Unable to unify "?x@{a:=?M4874; b:=?M4875; y:=?M4876} = ?x@{a:=?M4874; b:=?M4875; y:=?M4876}" with "Bar A (GoodR A R) (xs ++ bs ++ cs)".

ctx: intros A R l H xs bs cs H0.
exceptions.tactic: apply (fun _ => exist (fun a => xs ++ cs = a) (xs ++ cs) eq_refl).
exceptions.exn: In environment X : forall (A B : Set) (R : Rel A) (S : Rel B) (f : A -> B), (forall a b : A, R a b -> S (f a) (f b)) -> (forall b : B, {a : A | b = f a}) -> forall l : list A, GRBar A R l -> GRBar B S (map f l) A : Set R : Rel A xs, cs : list A H : GRBar A R (xs ++ cs) bs : list A X0 : forall (A B : Set) (R : Rel A) (S : Rel B) (f : A -> B), (forall a b : A, R a b -> S (f a) (f b)) -> (forall b : B, {a : A | b = f a}) -> forall l : list A, GRBar A R l -> GRBar B S (map f l) Unable to unify "{a : list A | xs ++ cs = a}" with "GRBar A R (xs ++ bs ++ cs)".

ctx: intros A R l H xs bs cs H0.
exceptions.exn: In environment X : forall (A B : Set) (R : Rel A) (S : Rel B) (f : A -> B), (forall a b : A, R a b -> S (f a) (f b)) -> (forall b : B, {a : A | b = f a}) -> forall l : list A, GRBar A R l -> GRBar B S (map f l) A : Set R : Rel A xs, cs : list A H : GRBar A R (xs ++ cs) bs : list A X0, X2 : forall (A B : Set) (R : Rel A) (S : Rel B) (f : A -> B), (forall a b : A, R a b -> S (f a) (f b)) -> (forall b : B, {a : A | b = f a}) -> forall l : list A, GRBar A R l -> GRBar B S (map f l) X1 : forall (A : Type) (P : A -> Prop) (x : A), P x -> {x : A | P x} Unable to unify "GRBar A R (xs ++ cs)" with "GRBar A R (xs ++ bs ++ cs)".

original: intros A R l H xs bs cs H0. apply subRelGRBar with (f := (fun x : A => x)). apply (fun a b _ => eq_refl). apply (fun _ => exist (fun a => xs ++ cs = a) (xs ++ cs) eq_refl). apply H.
